statements.select: with CTE_Deploy_AccessPoint as ( select cast(a.AccessPoint as varchar) as AccessPoint,b.OrderNo, b.Levels, b.ParentId,b.ItemId,cast(b.ItemName+(case when RunMode = 0 then '' else '(调试节点)' end) as varchar) as ItemName from (select AccessPoint,objectId ,RunMode from Cer_DeployNode where ApplicationIdFrom='BG001' and ApplicationIdTo='IG001' ) a left join (select * from Sys_DictionaryItem where Status=1 and DictionaryId = '00005' ) b on a.ObjectId = b.ItemCode union all select cast('' as varchar) as AccessPoint,a.OrderNo,a.Levels, a.ParentId,a.ItemId,cast (a.ItemName as varchar) from Sys_DictionaryItem a inner join CTE_Deploy_AccessPoint b on a.ItemId = b.ParentId where a.Status=1 and a.DictionaryId = '00005' )select distinct m.* from CTE_Deploy_AccessPoint m union select AccessPoint,0 as OrderNo,3 as Levels,null as ParentId,'*' as ItemId,case when RunMode = 1 then '认证管理平台(调试节点)' else '认证管理平台' end as ItemName from Cer_DeployNode where ApplicationIdFrom='BP001' and ApplicationIdTo='IP002' order by Levels,OrderNo
